title: Modern Apartment in City Center
description: Beautiful 2-bedroom apartment with modern finishes, located in the heart of the city. Features a spacious living room, fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with city views.

title: Cozy Studio for Rent
description: Cozy studio apartment perfect for students or young professionals. Fully furnished with all utilities included.

title: Family House with Garden
description: Spacious 4-bedroom house with a beautiful garden, perfect for a family. Features a large kitchen, two bathrooms, and a garage.

title: Commercial Space in Business District
description: Prime commercial space ideal for office or retail. High foot traffic area in the business district.
facilities: Security system, Air conditioning, Elevator, Parking

title: Luxury Penthouse with Terrace
description: Exclusive penthouse with panoramic city views. Features 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, and a large terrace.
facilities: Terrace, Jacuzzi, Smart home system, Private elevator

title: Land for Development
description: Large plot of land suitable for residential or commercial development. All utilities available.

title: Renovated Historic Apartment
description: Beautifully renovated apartment in a historic building. Features original architectural details with modern amenities.
facilities: High ceilings, Original hardwood floors, Central heating

title: Student Accommodation
description: Affordable room in a shared student house. Close to universities and public transportation.

title: Mountain Cabin
description: Cozy cabin in the mountains, perfect for weekend getaways. Features a fireplace and beautiful views.
risks: Remote location, Limited access in winter

title: Modern Office Space
description: Modern office space in a new building. Open floor plan with meeting rooms and kitchen area.
facilities: Meeting rooms, Kitchen, High-speed internet, Parking
